meanings.definition: The mark or impression left by a foot, shoe, or animal.
meanings.sent1: I followed the footprints in the snow to find my lost dog.
meanings.sent2: The detective examined the footprints at the crime scene for clues.
meanings.sent3: The footprints in the sand seemed to be leading me towards buried treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her footprints in the mud were like a trail of breadcrumbs, guiding us through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The footprints on the path were so deep, it looked like giants had walked there.

meanings.definition: A trace or evidence of someone's presence or actions.
meanings.sent1: The footprints of the thief led straight to the stolen jewels.
meanings.sent2: The footprints of history can still be seen in the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent3: The footprints of the mischievous raccoon were all over the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness left footprints on my heart that will never fade.
meanings.sent5: The footprints of time can be seen in the wrinkles on his face.
